offer_app.tests package

Submodules

offer_app.tests.test_offer_detail module

class offer_app.tests.test_offer_detail.OfferDetailDetailsTest(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the OfferDetailView API endpoint. This test case includes tests for retrieving offer details.

setUp()

Set up the test client and authentication token for each test.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the OfferDetailDetailsTest class. This method is called once for the entire test class.

test_get_authorized()

Test the GET request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication.

test_get_not_exist()

Test the GET request for a non-existent offer detail.

test_get_unauthorized()

Test the GET request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint without authentication.

class offer_app.tests.test_offer_detail.OfferDetailTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the OfferDetailView API endpoint. This test case includes tests for creating, updating, and deleting offer details.

setUp()

Set up the test client and authentication token for each test.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the OfferDetailTests class. This method is called once for the entire test class.

test_delete_authorized_not_owner()

Test the DELETE request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication but not as the owner.

test_delete_authorized_owner()

Test the DELETE request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication as the owner.

test_delete_not_exist()

Test the DELETE request for a non-existent offer detail.

test_delete_unauthorized()

Test the DELETE request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint without authentication.

test_get_authorized()

Test the GET request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication.

test_get_not_exist()

Test the GET request for a non-existent offer detail.

test_get_unauthorized()

Test the GET request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint without authentication.

test_patch_authorized_not_owner()

Test the PATCH request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication but not as the owner.

test_patch_authorized_owner()

Test the PATCH request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint with authentication as the owner.

test_patch_not_exist()

Test the PATCH request for a non-existent offer detail.

test_patch_unauthorized()

Test the PATCH request for the OfferDetailView API endpoint without authentication.

offer_app.tests.test_offer_list module

class offer_app.tests.test_offer_list.OfferListTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the OfferListView API endpoint. This test case includes tests for creating and listing offers.

setUp()

Set up the test client and authentication token for each test.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the OfferListTests class. This method is called once for the entire test class.

test_get_authorized_consumer()

Test the GET request for the OfferListView API endpoint with authentication.

test_get_authorized_seller()

Test the GET request for the OfferListView API endpoint with authentication.

test_get_unauthorized()

Test the GET request for the OfferListView API endpoint without authentication.

test_post_authorized_consumer()

Test the POST request for the OfferListView API endpoint with authentication.

test_post_authorized_seller()

Test the POST request for the OfferListView API endpoint with authentication.

test_post_unauthorized()

Test the POST request for the OfferListView API endpoint without authentication.
